data.title: Kevin Saul on LinkedIn: 'My most important job': Zoo boss announced as Father of the Year finalist
data.meta_description:
I'm reading ‘My most important job’: Zoo boss announced as Father of the Year finalist via the Daily Liberal app https://lnkd.in/g4yR4dAQ

Contatulations to my… | 10 comments on LinkedIn
data.text: Three year old Etzio Vidal, is living without his father, Aaron, who was killed in a horrific crash. David Vidal, Arron's dad, Etzio's grandfather, Chief Inspector of Police and Co-Founder of Road Trauma Support Group, NSW is calling for tougher penalties for road crimes. "They're not accidents; people make choices, taking lives," David says. Little Etzio is a poignant reminder. Each number in the road toll is a life, a family, a story. Treat vehicles responsibly—they're deadly weapons when misused. Chris Minns Hon. Jenny Aitchison MP #RoadSafety #DriveResponsibly #RTSG #TowardsZero #ItsACrash
